phases.A: Setup Ollama embeddings and data structure ✅
phases.D: Run experiment and update paper - IN PROGRESS

phase_d.key_finding: VDD has LOWER staleness than recency (0.266 vs 0.302)
phase_d.interpretation: VDD reduces stale retrievals vs recency, but static decay performs best in this scenario due to slow decay maintaining document trust in stable eras

notes: KEY INSIGHT: VDD beats recency on staleness, supporting the hypothesis that VDD helps when knowledge drifts while topic stays constant. However, static decay wins overall because the experiment has long stable eras where slow decay is optimal.
